sentences.english: Objective To research the clinical effect of microwave thermocoagulation in endonasal sinus surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究微波熱凝在鼻竇內窺鏡術中的臨牀作用。

sentences.english: Objective To study the application of the endoscopically assisted frontotemporal rhytidectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討內窺鏡技術在額顳部除皺術中的應用。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the influence of atomizing inhalation on post operative irrigation of ESS.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討內窺鏡鼻竇手術術後霧化吸入對療效的影響。

sentences.english: Manometry and endoscopy may also be necessary.
sentences.chinese: 測壓術和內窺鏡可能也是必要的。

sentences.english: All of the swallowed objects were later recovered with endoscopic surgery.
sentences.chinese: 最後通過內窺鏡手術取出了她所吞下的東西。

sentences.english: To evaluate the usability of endoscopy for the diagnosis of rhinorrhea.
sentences.chinese: 評價鼻內窺鏡應用於鼻淵辨證施治中的價值。

sentences.english: Methods Nasofrontal duct was extended and the bottom of frontal sinus was opened under nasal endoscope.
sentences.chinese: 方法在內窺鏡下擴大鼻額管，開放額竇底。

sentences.english: Nasal endoscopy surgery was very effective to the treatment of fungus ball in sphenoid sinus.
sentences.chinese: 蝶竇黴菌病可採用鼻內窺鏡下蝶竇手術。

sentences.english: This paper described a technique, "Transnasal endoscopicsphenoid sinus surgery ", that had been used for 28 patients.
sentences.chinese: 應用內窺鏡鼻竇外科技術施行蝶竇區域的手術28例。

sentences.english: Objective: To investigate the curative effect of treatment by radiofrequency under nasal endoscopy on adenoidal hypertrophy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鼻內窺鏡下射頻治療腺樣體肥大的療效。

sentences.english: Endoscope, for example a colonoscope, and a cleaning method for use therewith.
sentences.chinese: 內窺鏡，例如結腸鏡，以及其所採用的清洗方法。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the feasibility of nasal endoscopic approach technique in optic canal decompression.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鼻內窺鏡在視神經管減壓術中應用的可能性。

sentences.english: For this reason Arjen underwent arthroscopic surgery in London.
sentences.chinese: 因此阿揚已經在倫敦接受了內窺鏡手術。

sentences.english: Sterile powder for injection, injection of solvent or thinner sections endoscope washing agent.
sentences.chinese: 注射用無菌粉末，溶劑清洗劑或稀釋劑節內窺鏡注射。

sentences.english: The endoscopic appearance with colonoscopy, demonstrating mucosal erythema and erosion, is seen here.
sentences.chinese: 結腸鏡檢查的內窺鏡表現爲黏膜紅斑和破損。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of ethmoidectomy for the treatment of optic neuritis under nasal endoscope.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價鼻內窺鏡下篩竇切除術治療視神經炎的效果。

definition: (TCM) pulse feeling and palpitation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]
biopsy/abbr. for 活體組織檢查|活体组织检查[huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2]

definition: fluid loaded into a syringe for a hypodermic injection
